scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others --names "Dev Client","Dev Server" --prefix-colors blue,yellow "pnpm run client:dev" "pnpm run server:dev"
scripts.release: concurrently --kill-others --names "Release Client","Release Server" --prefix-colors blue,yellow "pnpm run client:release" "pnpm run server:release"
scripts.client:release: cd client && pnpm run build && serve -l 3000 --single dist
